info.title: feature-api
info.description: A/B testing and remote feature configuration

200.description: A list of features and settings for the group

post.description: Get a list of features and settings for a given device, user and app

parameters.name: tag_name
parameters.description: The tag (and its parents) for which features are being requested

parameters.name: client
parameters.description: Information about the client making the request

200.description: A list of features and settings for the group

locale.description: The locale desired for returned resources

ver.description:
The "ver" value returned from a previous call to this API which will cause features
having a return_if_before value generated before ver not to be returned

id.description: A unique identifier for the device

country.description: The country in which the user is acting or to which they are assigned

anon_id.description: If the user is not an authenticated user, an anonymous identifier for them (such as a guid)

ver.description:
A version value which should be passed to future calls such that features marked with a
"return_if_before" value that comes before ver will not be returned

features.description:
A list of feature-variant assignments for the user. Note that if the user is assigned
to the "control group" for a feature, no entry will be sent for that feature

r.description: FALSE if this feature should not be recorded via analytics events (e.g. we don't need to measure anymore)

v.description: Variant for feature. If the variant and feature name are the same, only the feature name will be sent

p.description: Payload for the feature and the variant, if available

l.description: Localized resources associated with the variant
